DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : Does time spend within target INR range differ patient manage AMD IT model anticoagulation care ? Experimental Design : The 36-month trial enrol 192 eligible patient currently receive chronic warfarin therapy William S. Middleton Memorial VA Hospital . Consenting patient enrol randomized 1 2 group : usual clinic care face-to-face visit every 4 week ( AMS model ) clinic visit every 3 month interim laboratory visit telephone follow-up every 4 week ( IT model ) . At study conclusion , amount time INR within target range compare two group . Thromboembolic bleed event rate , patient knowledge , quality life healthcare utilization also analyze .
